speaker: intercessor
text: Ohh, HEARER_SAINT! What has happened to you?!

speaker: intercessor
text: Ohh, brother... you don't look so good...

speaker: intercessor
text: Saints, come quickly! We need to pray for our dear HEARER_SAINT!

speaker: intercessor
text: Hurry, everyone! We need to pray for this brother!
